projects.title: Tech Store
projects.bodyText:
- User **registration/login** option.
 - Cart section (what is **added** to the cart is displayed).
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store products.
 - Option to **search** products.

projects.title: Restobares App (Dingbell)
projects.bodyText:
- A mobile application that will **help** you **speed** up and improve the **time** of service to the **user**.
 - Option to select **categories**.
 - Option to **search** for a menu.
 - Option to **pay** online or on site (table).

projects.title: VideoGames App
projects.bodyText:
- Web application that allows viewing, **filtering** and **searching** by different criteria of different video games called through an **API** external **(www.api.rawg.io)**.
 - Realization of **REST** Services, **ORM** with Sequalize.
 - Use pure **CSS** design.
